messages._comment: If you want no message, leave an empty string

global.bountyAdd: &6{player} has set a bounty for {bounty_player} for a price of ${amount}
global.bountyRemove: &6{player} has removed their bounty from {bounty_player} of a price ${amount}
global.bountyKill: {player} has claimed the bounty from {bounty_player} of a price ${amount}

private.bountyKill: Bounty claimed from {player} at a price of ${amount}

errors.cmdFormatException: Please specify who to place a bounty on and the amount
